title: KDP Niche Research Four Strategies For Finding Winning Low Content Book Niches
description:
In this video I go over the 4 strategies I use when doing research for Kindle Direct Publishing Low Content books.  Before I start my research process I cover the 4 questions I ask during research:

1. Are people searching on amazon
2. Are there similar books
3. Is there demand
4. Is there overwhelming competition

The four strategies I am currently using for research are as follows:

1. Amazon Suggestion Expander x Book Bolt  (LINKS BELOW)
2. Passion Niches x Book Bolt
3. Search by type of book
4. Pinterest

To find passion niches just do a simple google search for "list of passion niches."  The one I use for this video can be found here:
https://kingpinning.com/list-of-passionate-buyer-niches/
